text: Sylvia J. Luke (born December 15, 1967) is an Korean-American lawyer and politician. Since 2022, she has been the 16th lieutenant governor of Hawaii under Governor Josh Green. Luke also served as a member of the Hawaii House of Representatives from 1999 until 2022. In August 2022, Luke won the Democratic nomination for lieutenant governor. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lieutenant Governors of Hawaii Category:Lawyers from Hawaii Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Sylvia Luke
